Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: I used to go to Mr. Tong's all the time, the food was always authentic, fresh and very flavorful.  On my recent trip back there, however, everything was bad.  Two friends and I went over there for lunch last week.  We noticed that it's …

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: I've walked by Mr. Tongs for years and never paid it any mind since I already have my go to spot for chinese closer to home. I checked out this spot due to all the great reviews on yelp. I ordered the sweet and sour combination that came …

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: Definitely a notch above your average takeout Chinese place. Mr. Tong's offers restaurant quality dishes at very reasonable prices. Do yourself a favor and try some of the dishes that you would normally not see at a takeout place. Their …

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: I love Mr. Tongs!!!! Best Chines Food in Queens. Best Service!! The staff is amazing, down to earth, friendly. They really seem to care about their customers. They really make you feel like you're home. I love going to places that have excellent food and excellent service. It's like you're getting the best of both worlds!

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: Wonderful food and service. The best hot and sour soup. I never tried a dish that I did not like. At least twice a week I had  my lunch there when I lived in Queens, NY. Each time I am back to NY I make sure to eat there.

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text:
Sweet and sour... I have NEVER had a more wonderful sauce than this.
The usual 'red' glop is non-existent here, and a light, slightly sweet/sour 'true' sauce  was a delightful surprise to my first delivery order. We were in the …

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: I've tried three different dishes here. The only one that was ok was orange chicken. The last dish I had was so salty I needed three bottles of water to get through it

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: The food has eggs and note that eggs are very delicate in wich if not cooked correctly can give you salmanela posining in this case this has been the sencond time this has happen I hope they get inspected

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text:
Good authentic food, affordable.
Friendly, professional service.
I go out of my way to order from them even after we moved.

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: My experience at mr.tongs was a delight. Very fancy and the staff is very nice and respectful.

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: The right your and sour soup. Good service. Fast service for lunch.

Name: Mr Tong's
Review Text: Good place to order from, enjoyed many meals from here.

Review Text: Looove their kung pow chicken and saute snow pea leaf.
